## Guardrail Compliance Checklist
<!-- Ensure all applicable guardrails are maintained -->

### Citation Integrity
- [ ] All regulatory statements have verified citations
- [ ] Citation format follows standards (docs/CITATION_STANDARDS.md)
- [ ] All citation links tested and functional
- [ ] No secondary source reliance without primary verification

### Hallucination Prevention
- [ ] No generation of unverified regulatory content
- [ ] All regulatory text sourced from authoritative databases
- [ ] Uncertainty explicitly flagged where applicable
- [ ] Tests include hallucination detection

### Assumption Tracking
- [ ] All assumptions explicitly logged
- [ ] Assumption disclosure included in outputs
- [ ] Alternative interpretations noted where relevant
- [ ] Limitations clearly stated

### Conservative Interpretation
- [ ] Default to stricter compliance interpretation where ambiguous
- [ ] Alternative interpretations documented
- [ ] Professional review recommended for significant choices

### Non-Legal Advice Boundaries
- [ ] Disclaimers present in all outputs
- [ ] Language avoids legal advice patterns
- [ ] Professional review recommendations included

### Verification and Quality
- [ ] Automated verification checks implemented
- [ ] Audit trail logging included
- [ ] Error handling fails safely
- [ ] No silent failures
